Description:
for more info or to contact admins, please check our info site at: https://info.fouroclockfarms.club

Fouroclockfarms.club is a small instance run by a couple queer farmers.

TL;DR

  • Be cool to each other.
  • No Nazis. No TERFs. No Harassment.
  • This server is an 18+ server. Nudity, sexuality, and strong language are recognized as a normal part of the human experience. Use appropriate content warnings.
  • FourOclockFarms.club is privacy focused and does not allow full text search, public viewing of timelines, or indexing.

Code of Conduct:

The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of fouroclockfarms.club:

Use content warnings liberally for: Nudity/Sexual Content, Drugs/Alcohol, Mental Health, Violence, Injuries/Wounds/Hospitalization/etc, Food/Dieting, Politics/World Events/etc

The following types of content (text, media), behaviors, or rationalizations of, will be removed from the public timeline, and users posting or promoting the following types of content will have their access revoked:

  • Sexual content involving minors, including artistic depictions
  • Gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions
  • Nazism, Alt-Right, Right Wing Extremism, Christian Nationalism, Zionism, Tankies, Free Speech Extremists,
  • Racism, Xenophobia, Antisemitism, Islamophobia, Bigotry, Transphobia, Gender-critical
  • Sexism, Misogyny, Sex and/or Gender Discrimination
  • Image bots posting non-original or stolen content
  • Untagged nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content
  • Mass following and aggregation of content
  • Trolling, insulting, and derogatory comments, bullying, harassment, dog piling, stalking, impeding or interfering with service,
  • Spreading falsehoods, alternative facts, anecdotal evidence, prejudice or bias towards a social group, inciting violence, circular reporting, shock-provoking content, conspiracy theories, dark patterns, deepfakes, disinformation, misinformation, sensationalism, truthiness, propaganda, rumours, hoaxes, urban myths, pseudoscience, post-truth and opinion pieces or interviews that convey any of the previous.

These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason.

Admin
Short: A small, highly moderated, private server run by some wheat growing queers on the plains.

Description:
This server is a private group for a small group of internet people. This server was made to be our bridge to Mastodon and other servers Federated on it.

Rules will be enforced by discussion with leading and founding members. The core policy that will be considered when enforcing rules will be "Is it reasonable and does it negatively reflect on this server".

This server is funded at the expense of Collin Anderson, members wishing to contribute to that funding may contact him.

Membership to this server is by invitation only.

I acknowledge I'm not very good at writing a description for this place.

Description:
I'm not sure what started it, but at some point years ago I decided that being in control of my own dogotal data was important, and that I shouldn't rely solely on commercial entities like twitter, IG, FB, etc. Thankfully, others with the same convictions but actual programming abilities created software like Mastodon and other federated software.

I started this Mastodon instance while studying French, thus its French name which means "digital future" in English. This also got me thinking that First Nations communities should get online too! So I've registered Anishinaabe One, Autochtone Art, and even ᐊᓂᔑᓇᐯ.com to have ready to use as online social media instances for First Nations in Ontario and Manitoba.

This Mastodon server is self-hosted using the amazing Cloudron on a SSDNodes VPS. It is being backed up to a Minio instance which is hosted on another VPS from Kimsufi!
Short: A place to welcome the digital future.

Description:
Welcome!

Provo was a Dutch counterculture movement in the mid-1960s, including anarchists, provos, beatniks, pleiners, scissors-grinders, jailbirds, simple simon stylites, magicians, pacifists, potato-chip chaps, charlatans, philosophers, germ-carriers, grand masters of the queen's horse, happeners, vegetarians, syndicalists, santy clauses, kindergarten teachers, agitators, pyromaniacs, assistant assistants, scratchers and syphilitics, and other riff-raff.

We've named our instance in their honour.

Provo.lol

Provo.lol is a tiny server running Mastodon. Our small community values knowledge-sharing, creativity, empathy, and socialism. This guide will help people who want to join provo.lol to get started.

What is Mastodon?

Mastodon is a micro-blogging platform based on the principles of free, open source software and distributed networking. If you are familiar with Twitter, you already know what micro-blogging is: the sharing of short online messages with a public community. Mastodon is free and open source, which means that everyone can download the software free of charge, and contribute to its development. Mastodon’s network is distributed, which means that the messages sent across the network are not all stored on a single computer, but on as many computers as there are Mastodon servers.

You can see provo.lol as a tiny star in a vast network of Mastodon servers, a network that’s also known as the Fediverse (as in, federated + universe). Everyone who is part of provo.lol can connect with hundreds of thousands of microbloggers across the world!

Signing up

Signing up to a Mastodon server is easy. All you need is a username, an e-mail address and a password for your account. At provo.lol we’re not requiring anyone to give their real name. You could do so, but a nickname or alias is perfectly fine too. But do make sure you choose a good password. (For a fun way to generate strong passwords, try the diceware method at the Electronic Frontier Foundation.)

For extra security, it is possible to set up two-factor authentication later. Provo.lol uses Google Authenticator for this, an app you can download on your phone for free. We strongly recommend setting up two-factor authentication, as it allows us to verify it’s really you. Each time you log in, we can then check both your password and a unique code generated on your phone. In this way, someone who got hold of your password still would not be able to log in under your name. This keeps your account super safe.

If you want to sign-up to provo.lol, you will have to request an invitation, or wait until one of our community invites you.

Community culture

We’re a friendly community at provo.lol, and we hope you will make new friends on the Fediverse (recall, the big network of all Mastodon users). Please make sure to follow our Server Rules, which for example prohibit making racist or transphobic remarks, or inciting people to commit violence. Provo.lol will defederate from any servers that have a track-record of condoning fascists, racists, sexists, TERFs, or ableists.

If you see that any message or media broadcast by our server is inappropriate or offensive, or see that we amplify messages from a problematic server, please report it to @mar, our administrator.

Development

This instance is still under development, though it is currently functioning smoothly. Recently we've upgraded to Mastodon 4. We've added external physical storage (1TB SSD) for user file hosting and cache. We're trying to run this instance wholly locally, without dependence on cloud storage. We have daily off-site backups of our database.

Still to do: better documentation, and (ideally) a move to solar power
Short: The small community at provo.lol centres around the values of creativity, knowledge, empathy, global justice, and socialism.

Description:
Calamity.world is a private server for wonderful folks.

Created out of the demise of Mastodon.lol, and meant as an invite-only place for friends, family, and trusted others.

Why Calamity.world?

Let's face it, the world is kind of a mess at the best of times. But that's okay, because we can learn to live within the chaos of daily life, and find joy and fun in our own little ways. Calamity.world exists because no matter how crazy things get, we know that deep down, it's going to be fine.

Mastodon Server Covenant

This server agrees to follow the principles of the Mastodon Server Covenant. This means we adhere to the following rules and statements:

1. Active moderation against racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia

This server supports the 2SLGBTQIA+ community, feminists, activists, tinkerers, philosophers, and everyone in between. Fascists, Nazis, MAGAts, TERFs, and conspiracy-theorists are not welcome, and will be defederated.

2. Daily backups

This server, its configuration, database, and all uploaded media, is backed up daily both on-premises, and to AWS Cloud Storage (S3).

3. At least one other person with emergency access to the server infrastructure

This server is owned and operated by @t3rminus. Additionally @loginerror has emergency access to moderation tools, as well as the entire hosting platform and all related network services (including backups) remotely, and, if necessary, physically.

4. Commitment to give users at least 3 months of advance warning in case of shutting down.

If it ever becomes necessary to take this server offline, calamity.world pledges to provide 3 months of warning to allow users to backup their data, and migrate it to another server, if desired.

Trending Posts, Links, and Hashtags Policy

Trending content is manually reviewed, and will be featured subject to the following conditions:

  • They don't break any of the server rules.
  • They are written in, or are about topics in English. The server moderation is multilingual, but may lack regional context to make informed decisions about topics in other languages or from other countries.
  • They are primarily safe-for-work. Unfortunately some innocuous-seeming hashtags may lead to a considerable amount of not-safe-for-work content, and we cannot guarantee all included content will be posted with appropriate content warnings. We stand by our moderators' judgment on what constitutes "primarily safe-for-work".

Law Enforcement

This server is located and operated in Canada, and is subject to relevant laws and law-enforcement actions. While we take measures to protect user data and our users' right to privacy, we will cooperate with copyright holders and law enforcement should it ever become necessary.

Land Acknowledgement

We respectfully acknowledge that this server and its staff live and operate on the traditional and unceded territories of the Halkomelem speaking peoples, including the Qayqayt Nation, as well as the xʷməθkʷəy̓əm (Musqueam), Sḵwx̱wú7mesh (Squamish), and səlilwətaɬ (Tsleil-Waututh) Nations. We pledge to continue to recognize, support, and protect the heritage and history of these peoples that had been suppressed through the horrific acts of colonialism.

Credits

This server uses the following custom emoji:

  • Neocats by @volpeon@is-a.wyvern.rip – Partial set; Modified to correct hand colors by @t3rminus@calamity.world.
  • Mutant Standard by @dzuk@weirder.earth – Partial set; Modified to add updated polyamory and progress pride flags by @t3rminus@calamity.world.

Description:
Règles

Les règles de Sociala.Me sont les suivantes:

  1. Ne participez pas à du harcèlement, sous quelque forme que ce soit.
  2. Ne rendez pas publiques des conversations privées, sauf à l’équipe de modération en cas de signalement.
  3. Les injures raciales, sexistes ou oppressives en général vous vaudront d’être suspendu·e, même utilisé·e·s dans des conversations non-publiques.
  4. Il est permis de poster de la nudité sur l’instance, mais seulement en marquant le contenu concerné comme sensible et en aucun cas sur un fil public.
  5. Soyez gentil les uns avec les autres.
  6. Ne vous abonnez pas à un compte hébergé sur cette instance en utilisant un robot logiciel programmé pour suivre automatiquement de multiples comptes.

Modération

La modération de l’instance est assurée bénévolement par les administrateurs et les modérateurs. Elles et ils sont chargé·e·s d’appliquer les règles énoncées plus haut. À cette fin, ils et elles sont libres d’utiliser l’ensemble des outils à leur disposition.

Mentions légales

Cette instance est un service de communication au public en ligne édité à titre non professionel au sens de l'article 6,III,2° de la loi n°204-575 du 21 juin 2004. Conformément à loi française, si nous avons préférées rester anonymes, nos éléments d’identification personnelle ont été transmis à notre hébergeur, Masto.Host.

Instance Mastodon géré par Sociala.Me (et son créateur : TeddyBeard)
Serveur privé uniquement sur invitation de la part de l'un des modérateurs.

Description:
This is a general purpose social server catering to what I want to see. It is personally funded by me and I have no interest in charging for it. I really just wanted a place to call my own.

The best way to start a heated argument with others is to discuss religion or politics. You keep your right wing Christian conservative views to yourself, I'll keep my moderate leaning more left than right Pagan views to myself.

Other than that, I'll listen to any complaints folk may have about posts here but I also will not ban anyone for being white, black, brown, yellow or green, gay straight, transgendered, bisexual a-sexual, queer, redneck, Christian, Pagan, Buddhist, Jewish, Muslim, Mormon, or anything else as long as we are all friendly!

This can all be summed up with Harm none. Or if you prefer, treat others as you would like to be treated.

We also accept others pronouns here, no intentionally miss-pronouning anyone.
Short: Just my personal server to filter out some of the toxicity that can come from a large community. All are welcome

Description:
Además de las reglas de servidor que se encuentran a continuación, nos regimos por las siguientes normas de etiqueta:

  • Intenta añadir texto descriptivo (alt text) a las imágenes y fotos que subas. No se tarda mucho y ayuda a que las personas con dificultad para ver no se sientan excluídas. Una descripción corta es mejor que ninguna descripción.

  • Cuida nuestra timeline pública: Es la cara visible y una de las cosas que nos une como comodidad. Intenta compartir en ella las cosas que te gustan, y utiliza visibilidad "🔓 No listado" o "🔒 Solo seguidores" para las que te disgustan.
Short: This is functional, but not a real server. Check owo.cafe for that.

Description:
Hips.Social is a server instance of the Mastodon Decentralized Social Network.

Although this instance was established to serve the active community of fans of the rock band, the Mother Hips, our user base consists of people from all walks of life with a great diversity of interests.

In the spirit of old-internet message boards, like The Grotto, and even pre-internet BBS systems, this server endeavors to deliver the feel of a local, tight-knit community, aligned around common interests.

Registration is open, so create an account and post a toot - yeah, that's the word - with the #hello hashtag and tell us a little bit about what brought you here.
Short: Mother Hips Fan Community

Description:
This is mostly a one-man (or, if you prefer, one-duck) operation because someone couldn't decide on an instance to join so he paid someone (masto-dot-host) to spin up a server instead. Some other folks are using this instance, mostly as ways to dip a toe in the waters of the fediverse, and that's just about as ambitious as we're likely to get around here.

There's a whole lot of boilerplate that needs filling out, definitely, at some point. Please be patient.
Short: A very small home server (for now, at least).

Description:
Data are indeed cool, and the 512 character length free text fields provided by Mastodon appears to be the ideal microblogging solution. NPL this, GPT that.

Local instance - content responsibility for posting

The best form of censorship is self censorship. In order to optimise this, this is @waf's #fediverse instance so no further censor is required. Opinions posted on this instance are those of the poster, not the owner, but things that are way out there are dealt with.

Mixed instance - content responsibility for viewing

People have professional and personal lives. Thought they might be mixed within account, or within instance, the lines are fairly clear here.

Division Leipzig

Die Mission des PERMANIZER-Verlages besteht darin, Projekte als permanente Bestandteile der Gesellschaft zu etablieren, die nur mit persönlichem Engagement diesseits ihrer Rentabilität angeschoben werden müssen, um später finanziell selbsttragend der Allgemeinheit größtmöglich zu nützen.

Short: My personal mastodon instance :)

Description:
Skyhoppers.Club

This instance exists first to give my buddies that listen to my podcast The Skyhoppers Podcast place to make their home in the Fediverse. Some patrons had made comments about not quite understanding how Mastodon works, so I took it upon myself to create a space for them and to be their guiding hand through the Fediverse (even though I'm kind of a n00b myself). I'm just starting out on my admin journey, so I'm very open to feedback/helpful tips!

This isn't just an instance for my podcast, though. I've been a huge fan of Star Wars all my life and after I left the internet at large at some point in the last few years, I was really missing a place to talk/post about it and discuss it with other like-minded people. So we'll call that reason Nummer zwei that this instance exists: for Star Wars fans! Hopefully the URL is ambiguous enough to maybe drag in a few stragglers from out there amongst the stars.

Once the podcast Patreon gets started back up (I've had it paused while we've been on break, so our coffers are a little light), I'll be using money from there that doesn't go into hosting the show to host this instance. We had a website for a while, but wouldn't you know that having a website requires a lot of unfun work that I never wanted to do. So hopefully this sticks a little better :)

The rules basically come down to "don't be a dick." I'm not going to tolerate hate of any kind here, and you'll get booted right quick if you start talking shit like that. There's a little more detail in the Rules section below if needed. If you enjoy your time spent here, take a second to consider subbing to our Patreon and supporting my efforts that way. Otherwise, just hang out, be cool, and have fun!
Short: Created as a place for fans of the Star Wars podcast The Skyhoppers Podcast to convene, but any general Star Wars fans or other cool people are also welcome!

Description:
I started mastodon.technology in 2017, with a pending shutdown in 2022. I've copied the Code of Conduct that I used there for this server to give you a sense for what kind of place I helped create on the internet.

Rules

  • No advertising or excessive promotion.
  • No bots, unless they're cute, funny, or useful. Bots should avoid posting to the public timeline.
  • No pornography.
  • No gore or graphic violence.
  • Content that is borderline NSFW or could be construed as NSFW at a glance should be put behind a CW (Content Warning).
  • No racism.
  • No sexism.
  • No discrimination based on gender, sexual minority, sexual orientation, disability, physical appearance, body size, race, ethnicity, religion (or lack thereof), or national origin.
  • No xenophobia, nationalism, casteism, or fascism; no sympathizing with or advocating for these things.
  • No sexual depictions of children.
  • No holocaust denialism, no Nazi symbolism, no promotion of National Socialism.
  • No stalking or harassment. In general, if someone asks you to stop interacting with them, then stop.
  • Stalking, harassment, hate speech, or doxing that is posted to other instances or on other social media platforms is still grounds for having your account terminated here.
  • No posting (or threatening to post) other people's personally identifying information ("doxing").
  • No unwelcome sexual attention.
  • No public or private oppressive language or actions.
  • No promotion of conspiracy theories (eg anti-vax, anti-mask, anti-COVID).
  • No unsolicited advice to strangers.
  • No advocating for, or encouraging, any of the above behaviour.
  • No other unethical conduct.
  • No scraping content from web interface or API.

To protect the free speech of users belonging to marginalized groups, this instance does not federate with overtly fascist instances. Additionally, we will refuse to federate with instances that themselves choose to federate with fascist instances.

Handling harassment

If you are being harassed, please report the user using the "…" button and then "Report." For urgent concerns, please DM Ash.

If you engage in harassing behavior, the moderator may take any action they deem appropriate, such as a warning or an expulsion.

The above rules may change at any time, and you may be banned at any time based on the moderators' judgment.

Privacy policy

What will we do with your data? Nothing. How will you be influenced by advertisers? You won't. How will we aggregate your data in order to improve your service… none of that.

We will never share your data with anyone else, except in the case of valid legal requests if it comes to that. (Hopefully it won't come to that!) Similarly, users and third parties are forbidden from scraping content from the instance's web interface or API; you are required to respect robots.txt files.

More privacy measures on mastodon.technology:

  • HTTPS is used everywhere thanks to Let's Encrypt.
  • No ads or trackers.
  • Links are direct URLs rather than tracking redirects.
  • Understand though that this instance is run by Ash, and (as is the case with all Mastodon servers) he potentially have access to your data, including DMs. The back-end is also not encrypted. If this is not okay with you, this might not be the instance for you.

Also, for truly private data sent between two people, Mastodon offers no E2E encryption. So use Signal for the things you really want to be private.
Short: This is Ash Furrow’s personal instance.
Andy Bell’s personal Mastodon instance.

Description:
scuttle.cloud is part of the Mastodon network and is hosted in Finland by bitlevel. This is an invite only server.

If you already are a member of the scuttle.cloud community and have a valid account, you can use your credentials to log in to this instance.

The idea of a distributed social network based on open standards with no clear owner and no tracking or profiling of users and no algorithms that provide personalized content is a superb one.

Funding

This server is fully funded by bitlevel.
Short: scuttle.cloud - the Fediverse gateway for Bitlevel and friends.

Description:
¡Te damos la bienvenida a nuestro servidor para Administradores de Fincas Colegiados (AFC)!

Antes de comenzar a utilizar nuestro servidor de Mastodon, te invitamos a leer nuestras Normas de Conducta. En esta plataforma buscamos crear un espacio seguro y descentralizado donde los Administradores de Fincas puedan encontrar a otros usuarios, pero también aceptamos toots sobre otros temas relacionados con la profesión.

Te pedimos que respetes las normas de conducta que hemos establecido. No se permiten conductas o comentarios discriminatorios u ofensivos, ni contenido que incumpla las leyes. También te pedimos que te asegures de cumplir con las leyes y regulaciones aplicables en materia de protección de datos y derecho de autor, así como con las normas y regulaciones de la profesión de Administrador de Fincas.
Short: Le damos la bienvenida a la sala de juntas para Administradores de Fincas Colegiados.

Description:
Welcome to educhat.social - a Mastodon instance for educators.

Please help keep this space safe for all who want to participate. No spamming. No personal attacks. Your opinions are welcome, but we encourage thoughtful conversation over provocation.

Membership at educhat.social is free and open to all educators. Registration may require proof of affiliation with an educational entity or that you otherwise support education.

If you would like to financially support us please consider donating via Patreon at: patreon.com/educhat

Description:
後巷，除了每天夜裏，女侍寧把垃圾拿出來倒以外，沒有人會經過的地方。凹凹凸凸坑坑窪窪，滿地是酸臭的垃圾、蒼蠅、排洩物、嘔吐物。兩面磚牆觸手冰涼，畫滿了塗鴉和髒話。在這裏似乎連時間也不動了，只有遠處隱約傳來珈琲館吧檯的柔和音樂聲，與城市的各色燈光在這晦暗的角落一閃一閃。

這裏彷彿是未竟之暗與未抵之明的交界，沒有別人，只有妳和妳自己。沉寂是唯一的聲音，妳放聲哭泣，也沒人聽得見。這是城市裡最陰暗的地方，也是最孤寂的角落。
Short: 夏物語，這裡是夏的小樹洞，每天夏會來到這裡說說話，沒有人會在此逗留。如果你願意，可以悄聲走進來看一看，也歡迎留下些許隻字片語。

Description: MacGeneration offre un traitement sans concession de l’actualité informatique avec les services de presse en ligne MacGeneration (dédié à l’actualité Apple et Mac), iGeneration (dédié à l’actualité iPhone et smartphones), et WatchGeneration (dédié à l’actualité Apple Watch et objets connectés). MacGeneration publie l’application iGeneration, édite une collection de livres numériques, et propose divers services à ses lecteurs : un forum d’entraide, le guide d’achat Je veux le top, le site de petites annonces iOccasion, et le moteur de recherche de produits reconditionnés RefurbGeneration. MacGeneration emploie onze personnes à plein temps, dont sept journalistes.

Description:
What is toot.sh?

Toot.sh is a mastodon instance, we welcome all content within our rules and policies but do not require a specific focus. We are generally a group of professionals in the tech industry, so if that's you and you're looking for a mastodon home, you're very welcome here.

How we moderate

Moderation is carried out inline with our server rules. If you are being harassed or otherwise see content that is breaking our rules, please report the user. Click the "..." button and then "Report". For urgent concerns please DM Elliot.

In the future if/as this instance grows we will look at a way to bring in a more transparent moderation process and team. Currently while the instance is both tiny and those here are content with it moderation is be carried out by the server administrators listed on the about page.

Privacy policy

We will not do anything with your data aside from using it to run this mastadon instance. No advertising, no algorithms, no aggregating data.

We will never share your data with anyone else, except in the case of valid legal requests if it comes to that. Simiarly, users and third parties are forbidden from scraping content from the instance's web interface or API; you are required to respect robots.txt files.

Some additional privacy measures we take on toot.sh are:

  • HTTPS is used across the entire site.
  • There are no adveritsments or trackers.
  • We do not alter URLs to add additional tracking (although users may use tracking links from services like bit.ly of their own choice).

In addition to the above it is worth noting that this instance is run by Elliot plus additional volunteers. Anyone with access to the server for maintenance purposes could potentially have access to your data, including direct messages (DMs). There is no End-to-End Encryption (E2EE) on Mastodon. For anything you wish to be turely private, you should use a service like Signal.
Short: Toot.sh is a small network of professionals in the tech industry, all are welcome and general use is encouraged as long as you follow our rules.

Description:
Once upon a time there was the Twitter, and the people were happy.

Then the Twit with too much sink walked in and bad pun. People left and joined the federated space - but the early adopters weren't prepared, and some became hermits.

To truly remove reliance on Twits and unprepared hermits, a little RaspberryPi was co-opted to provide a space for the Chudfam to remain connected.

Description: I wanted my own ActivityPub server so I could connect with others in the Fediverse, and the GoToSocial software — written in Go(lang) — was way easier to set up than some of the alternatives. I have been calling this an "alpha" instance. It uses alpha software (which is how GtS describes itself), and is on a free VPS in the Oracle Cloud Free Tier. I started it in October 2023, and it has been alive longer than I ever expected.
Short: Steven Rosenberg's single-user GoToSocial ActivityPub/Fediverse server is running on AlmaLinux 9 on an Oracle Cloud Free Tier VPS.

Description:
Welcome to vyrse.social!

Storytelling touches all aspects of our lives. Narrative is a powerful tool in all forms of communication and experience, even in the most empirical fields of study.

Writers, podcasters, actors, journalists, academics, artists and activists are all storytellers. The power of communication and creative expression unites us!

This instance wants to be a home for those who live and breath communication and creative expression. We are all different, but find common ground in our love of storytelling and narrative.

No corporate & brand accounts are permitted, but self-promotion is welcome. Collaboration is encouraged. Exploration and growth is the goal!
Short: A home for storytellers. Artists, authors, actors, scientists, journalists, musicians... anyone and everyone who is driven to use story and narrative to explain, entertain and understand.

Description:
리데아 - 현실적 이상주의자들의 소셜 네트워크

리데아(RLidea)라는 표현은 현실적 이상주의(Realistic Idealism)의 줄임말로, 이상적인 가치나 목표를 추구하면서도 현실적인 조건과 제약을 고려하여 실제로 실행 가능한 방법을 모색하고 실현하려는 태도를 나타냅니다.

이 공간은 이와 같은 삶의 태도를 가진 사람들이 모이는 자유 주제 소셜 네트워크입니다.

Description:
About

This instance is invite-only for tech-professionals, coders, hackers, open-source enthusiasts and alike.

We like to build a curated community of nice people that love to nerd out about tech stuff or just need a safe home or a fresh start. But everyone is welcome as long as they follow the rules.

We deeply believe in life, respect, peace, human- and digital rights. We also talk about gaming, music, hobbies, pets and LGTBQIA+ stuff.

Bums... what?

"Bums" is German colloquial speech. It's literal meaning is something like "loud bang" or "loud pop". It's often used by younger people to devalue things, so "bumscode" means something along the lines of "shitcode" or "crapcode". Think of "bums" like the "f" in "wtf".

The origin of "bumscode" is not 100% clear, but a group of coders at the company kris is working at, has been using it consistently in code reviews and meetings to refer to bad or not working code. So it's kind of an in-joke.

Moderation

We do not federate with facist instances or instances that promote or tolerate harassment, transphobia, homophobia, racism, sexism, doxxing, stalking, hate-speech, conspiracy theories, religious extremism, white supremacy, nationalism, colonialism or things that are illegal in Germany (like nazi-symbols and slogans).

If you see something that doesn't comply with our rules, just report it. If it's really really urgent, feel free to DM one of our moderators:

@maybeanerd, @kris ... (more to come)

Imprint / legal notice

You can read the full legal notice here. This instance is maintained by kris in his spare time and nerves. Don't push either of those.
Short: bumscode.com - an invite-only Fediverse instance for tech-professionals, coders, hackers, open-source enthusiasts and alike

Description:
神奈川県、旧相模国範囲の神社を巡り歩いて記録しているWeblog「相模の社を巡る」と同一管理のMastodonサーバ「さがみどん」です。地域の神社仏閣、民俗の話題を主に扱うため、そういった話題が苦手な方はご注意ください。 地域限定で宗教の話題を扱うという点とサーバ契約規模上、新規ユーザーの加入は難しいと考え、アカウント作成は閉鎖しています。

ホスティングサービス「Hostdon」を利用しています。 ハッシュタグリレー連合（https://hashtag-relay.dtp-mstdn.jp/）に参加しています。

Description:
mastodon.miri.site 是 Mastodon 的一个中文实例。Mastodon 是一个开源的去中心化社交网络，整个 Mastodon 社区是由无数实例组成的。注册本实例后你不仅可以与本实例内的用户互动，并且可以与来自世界各地的其他实例中的用户无缝连接。

Mastodon 的去中心化设计防止了社交数据被少数公司或团体垄断的风险，也大大增加了屏蔽及过滤的难度。如果你有兴趣动手搭建一个实例，请参考官方文档。你可以随时导出备份自己的数据并申请转移到其他实例中而无需担心因为实例运营者的问题导致的数据丢失。

本实例不以任何形式做出 SLA（Service Level Agreement，服务等级协议）承诺。

你可以在爱发电支援我们运营本实例。
rules: [{'id': '2', 'text': '禁止发布对性取向、性癖、爱好、信仰、宗教、政治立场、民族、地域等的侮辱性言论'}, {'id': '3', 'text': '禁止对任何用户发送具有骚扰、猥亵、恐吓、威胁、诱骗、霸凌性质的内容、不受欢迎的性暗示内容，或其他令他人感到不安或不适、打扰他人正常生活的内容'}, {'id': '4', 'text': '请不要发布种族主义、性别主义、同性恋恐惧以及跨性别恐惧言论'}, {'id': '5', 'text': '只要涉及成人内容，包括文字及媒体，均需使用恰当的CW标签及隐藏内容警告'}, {'id': '6', 'text': '请不要发布违反伦理及社会共识的成人内容，如由真实的儿童参与制作的色情内容'}, {'id': '7', 'text': '禁止对其他用户实施任何人肉行为'}, {'id': '8', 'text': '禁止将本站服务用于正常交流以外的用途的滥用行为'}, {'id': '9', 'text': '请不要在未经作者授权的情况下发布他人作品'}]

Description:
Mastodon is not a single website. To use it, you need to make an account with a provider—we call them servers—that lets you connect with other people across Mastodon. Go pick a server and create an account. Whatever server you pick, you can talk to people from other servers. Don't agonize over the choice too much.

https://joinmastodon.org/servers

There are several apps you can use, for both iOS and Android. I personally use Pachli and Phanpy -- They're both great!

https://joinmastodon.org/apps

Description:
For all the 8-bit retro lovers1 and all kinds of tech enthusiasts especially. A small instance ran by @ikari. Hate speech prohibited, including but not limited to, racism, sexism, homophobia and transphobia.

It's more or less your next regular Mastodon instance, but with a theme and a nice short domain. As of 2022 the server has no funding, being a private initiative, so we provide a scale good for hundreds of users, but please be supportive if we turn into crowdfunding if it grows beyond that! :pixelheart:

8bit.red might be an optimal choice for European users. Both the servers and the CDN are located in Central Europe (Germany).

1 Actually whether your loved one is 8-, 16-, 32-bit, male, female, non-binary or furry, we don't care, as long as you love them.

Description:
Single-user instance for Markus Unterwaditzer. As a result there is not really anything interesting in terms of server policies or content rules.

Very unlikely to (intentionally) host NSFW content, and if so it will be behind a CW and marked as sensitive media.

If there is any problem with this instance or its contents I strongly prefer email communication to admin@woodland.cafe over pinging me on Mastodon itself. I cannot guarantee that the message does not get lost otherwise.

Technical details

  • Theme: Modern Mastodon
  • Theme: Tangerine UI

Adjacent services

  • Bookmark RSS is a tool to let users on any mastodon instance subscribe to their bookmarks via RSS.
  • Boost Graph, runs entirely in the browser.
  • RSSHub, for subscribing to other social media platforms via RSS.
  • List Bot, for (ab)using Mastodon's list feature to build alternative home feeds.

Random projects

  • @a11y_link_bot
  • Every Evrart

Mirrors/Frontends

  • Nitter, a Twitter mirror.
  • Breezewiki, a Fandom mirror.
  • Redlib, a Reddit mirror.

Description:
Why Mastodon?

Social media is no longer optional for the doctor - academically active or not. From promoting local causes important to you and your patients, to discussing important research. You will need social media.

To date, Twitter has been the forum used for this. However, it has always been less than ideal and increasingly so is entirely unsuitable. We are concerned by developments at Twitter, and by its impact on the ability of it's users to continue to engage the wider community in a safe way.

Our server will ensure that it's users are verified personally, meaning you can trust who the person says they are.

We intend this instance to provide a premium service to it's users in comparison to others instances. Limiting new joiners will allow us to scale our resources appropriately.

You can have a twitter account, and any number of mastodon accounts. Posting on all of them simultaneously or directing content to the appropriate account. I've deleted my twitter account. But I don't expect that will be everyones reaction to recent events.

Why Doctors only?

We have interest in all healthcare professionals, however, as this is a emerging social network we had to limit applications so that we can provide the high level of attention to detail that our users deserve.

The federation that Mastodon allows means that those who can not join yet, can communicate with those who have. And that in time they can migrate their accounts over to us benefiting from out service too.

Wont this increase my risk litigation or get me in trouble with the GMC?

Not necessarily, we do not advocate that you share information on Mastodon you wouldn't on any other social network. In fact, we find that people are most drawn into inappropraite behaviour by interaction with users, often trolls. This is something we hope to avoid on this curated and moderated network.

Can I still speak my mind?

Yes, of course. We do not intend to stiffle anyones free speech and ability to speak their mind. And, we will allow users to openly have accounts on multiple servers that are federated (many others instances will not allow this). This will allow users to pick the appropriate forum for their opinions personal, professional or other.

Verification Process

Each verification for the time being is being conducted personally. We do plan to open the community more widely, although do not want the quality of verification to be lowered. For the time being, we are personally reaching out to members of the community we think would be a good fit for this burgeoning community.

Think you're a good fit? Or have someone else in mind? Please contact us.

We may ask for proof you are who you say you are, for example, contact via an NHS.net account and your GMC number. Are you highly active on another platform? Please let us know so we can priortise your sign-up.

Usernames should be formatted @firstname_lastname. You're encouraged to add your GMC number as metadata and your speciality.

Pricing

Access to the instance is intended to be open and free going forwards with the only limitation being blocking problem instances assocaited with trolling or other cyber harm.

Verification and usage is free for the time being and will be for as long as possible. Federation on Mastodon means you are never locked to our instance and free movement is possible keeping your followers and data.

Description:
This is a small friends & family instance.

Rules and policies borrowed from meow.social, furry.engineer and infosec.exchange.

Moderation / Content Policies

Federation Policy

We are an open-first instance, however in cases where an instance had been identified as being, indifferent to, permissive of, or actively encouraging abusive conduct, that instance will be blocked from federation.

User Conduct Policy

In the hopefully unlikely event that a user breaks the rules, the offending content will be removed and the user suspended. For harassment, discrimination, or illegal activity, the user's account will be terminated.

User Generated Content

We ask that all profile content (avatar, header, display name, bio, etc.) are completely safe, without any explicit content.

Illegal content, or content depicting hate symbolism or iconography, will be removed and result in termination of the offending user.

Report System

Please report posts that make you feel uncomfortable, break the rules, or you otherwise think should be brought to our attention. You will never be penalized for using the report system in good faith.

Description:
Colloquium is for people interested in the Classics, and Latin and Ancient Greek, of any time period. Posting can be in any language we are capable of reading or machine translating. Off topic is fine, but please do have an interest and post about these topics and in these languages. If you show no interest in them, we may ask you to choose a different server.

Medievalists, Classists, Renaissance and New Latin scholars and readers welcome. Living Latin and Living Greek speakers and learners welcome.

We abide by the Mastodon Server Covenant https://joinmastodon.org/covenant This mean that we will * Back up user data daily * Give you three months notice if we decide to close the project
Short: Colloquium is for people interested ib the Classics, Latin and Greek. We abide by the Mastodon Server Covenant. Posting can be in any language we are capable of reading or machine translating.

Description:
Who we are

We're a small general purpose server just looking for a quiet life.

Most of us here are friends who have been here for years and at present we're not open to taking on new users.

Basic rules

Content we do not allow that will lead to limiting of accounts or suspension includes but is not limited to:

  • Harassment, block evasion, continuing to contact people after they've asked you to stop.
  • Hate speech and bigotry (queerphobia, racism, colourism, antisemitism, xenophobia, sexism, ableism).
  • Cryptocurrency, NFTs, or other financial scams.
  • Advertising, spam. We also prohibit direct asks for aid or unsolicited demands to boost posts or links.
  • Federation and other mass follow bots, archiving bots.
  • Malicious links and phishing.
  • Untagged NSFW and violent content.
  • Crossposting boosts and replies to Twitter without user consent.
  • Being a dick to sex workers

Moderation is at our discretion. Even if you haven't gone against any of the stated rules, we may still limit accounts or servers that are acting in bad faith, spreading harmful content, or otherwise causing problems.

Federation policy

We block instances that

  • Have no active prohibition against hate speech and bigotry.
  • Carry content illegal in the UK or Germany

We will also defederate with servers with users who continually go against our core rules. Like the basic rules, moderation of federation is also at our discretion and may occur for any reason.

Users (or other servers) diffusing sexist, homophobic, racist, transphobic content, relaying insults or threats against a person or a group for their origin, gender identity or sexual orientation, will be blocked or banned on sight. Feel free to contact me or use Mastodon federated report tool if you happen to find such messages on this instance.

Description:
Die Schweizerische Bundeskanzlei betreibt diese Mastodon-Instanz im Rahmen eines Pilotversuchs. Ziel ist es, Erfahrungen zu sammeln mit der Kommunikation in einem dezentral organisierten Netzwerk, das auf offener Software beruht.

Der Bundesrat und die Departemente können diese Instanz für offizielle Accounts nutzen. Privatpersonen, die mit den Accounts und Inhalten dieser Instanz interagieren möchten, brauchen dafür einen Account auf einer anderen Instanz. Eine Liste öffentlich zugänglicher Instanzen gibt es hier: https://joinmastodon.org/de/servers

+

La Chancellerie fédérale suisse exploite cette instance Mastodon dans le cadre d'un essai pilote. L'objectif est d'acquérir de l'expérience en matière de communication dans un réseau organisé de manière décentralisée et basé sur des logiciels ouverts.

Le Conseil fédéral et les départements peuvent utiliser cette instance pour des comptes officiels. Les personnes privées qui souhaitent interagir avec les comptes et les contenus de cette instance ont besoin pour cela d'un compte sur une autre instance. Une liste des instances accessibles au public est disponible ici : https://joinmastodon.org/fr/servers

+

La Cancelleria federale svizzera gestisce questa istanza di Mastodon nell'ambito di un test pilota. L'obiettivo è quello di fare esperienza con la comunicazione in una rete organizzata in modo decentralizzato e basata su un software aperto.

Il Consiglio federale e i dipartimenti possono utilizzare questa istanza per gli account ufficiali. I privati che desiderano interagire con gli account e i contenuti di questa istanza devono avere un account su un'altra istanza. L'elenco delle istanze accessibili al pubblico è disponibile qui: https://joinmastodon.org/it/servers
Short: Die Instanz der Schweizer Regierung. L' instance du gouvenement suisse. L' istanza del governo svizzero. L' istanza de la regenza svizra.
topic: Bundesrat - Conseil fédéral - Consiglio federale - Cussegl federal

Description:
Masto@Nox-Rhea - nous rejoindre

Habituellement, nous procédons à une validation manuelle des inscriptions. Si l'inscription est provisoirement désactivée et que vous souhaitez nous rejoindre, contactez @frater pour obtenir un lien d'invitation à usage unique.

Masto@Nox-Rhea - la modération

Nous pratiquons une modération active pour garantir que notre instance reste un espace d'échange respectueux.

Nous nous tenons prêt·es à reconduire aux frontières de l'instance tout fâcheux indésirable qui viendrait perturber la bonne ambiance.

Description:
The aim is to keep mastodon versions up to date with little lag. This instance is funded and properly administered purely by myself (@sean).

Anyone is free to use this instance with no/minimal interference from admin (me) unless absolutely necessary.

Bad actors will not be tolerated.

Features:

500 character limit.

ElasticSearch - search for statuses authored, favourited, or mentioned in.

Daily backups.

Hosted by Vectemis Systems.

Use and (hopefully) enjoy!

Sean.
Short:
An instance set up and run by me, a Linux Systems Admin. Why? Because I enjoy providing my own services.

A 500 character limit. All languages welcome.

Free for anyone to use.

Short: Private instance.

Description:
Instanssi blogeille

Instanssi, joka on tarkoitettu blogeille ja jossa blogit voivat jakaa omia artikkeleitaan.

Tai voit jopa halutessasi pitää täällä omaa mikroblogia! Olemmekin nostaneet merkkirajan tätä varten!

Rekisteröityminen vaatii ylläpidon hyväksynnän ja perustelut!

Ohjeita & vinkkejä

Listamme tähän tulevaisuudessa ohjeita ja vinkkejä siitä miten voitte sisältöä jakaa tänne automaattisesti.

Ylläpito

Tätä palvelinta ylläpitää Marko

Instanssin ylläpitoon ja moderointitiimiin haetaan aina vapaaehtoisia ja halukkaita. Tule mukaan kehittämään instanssia lähettämällä sähköpostia osoitteeseen moi@blogi.social

Säännöt

Ei pornografista, seksuaalista tai ylettömän väkivaltaista sisältöä.

Pornografinen ja seksuaalinen sisältö on kielletty. Alastomuus on sallittu, mutta se tulee piilottaa sisältövaroituksen taakse.

Liiallinen väkivaltainen sisältö on kielletty. Esimerkiksi: todellisia terroritekoja kuvaava väkivaltainen sisältö, teloitusvideot yms. Moderaattorit arvioivat tarvittaessa, mikä on liiallista.

Tämän lisäksi muu väkivaltainen sisältö tulee piilottaa sisältövaroituksen taakse.

Ei rasismia, seksismiä, transfobiaa, tai muuta vähemmistöihin kohdistuvaa syrjintää

Rasismi, seksismi, transfobia, antisemitismi tai muu vähemmistöön kohdistuva syrjintä on kielletty ja voi johtaa tilin pysyvään sulkemiseen.

Ei laittomuuksia

Kaikki Suomen lakeja rikkova sisältö on palvelimella kielletty ja johtaa tilin sulkemiseen ja käyttäjän raportointiin poliisille.

Ei häirintää, doksausta, valheellisen tiedon levittämistä tai muina esiintymistä

Muiden käyttäjien häirintä, palvelun toimintaa häiritsevä käytös, ja muu toiminta joka haittaa muiden käyttäjien käyttökokemusta on kielletty. Tällaisia asioita ovat muun muassa:

  • Viestien lähettäminen käyttäjälle sen jälkeen, kun tämä on pyytänyt keskustelun lopettamista tai muiden käyttäjien kehottaminen tällaiseen käytökseen.
  • Muiden käyttäjien yksityistietojen levittäminen.
  • Salaliittoteorioiden, disinformaation tai muun valheellisen tiedon levittäminen.
  • Esiintyminen jonain muuna henkilönä, jos kyse ei ole parodiasta. Parodiatilit tulee merkitä selvästi ja yksiselitteisesti sellaisiksi.
  • Kuvakaappauksien levittäminen muiden käyttäjien viesteistä ilman, että merkitsee kyseistä käyttäjää viestiin, tai muuten häiritsemistarkoituksessa.

Ei roskapostia

Älä ole roskapostittaja ja täytä muiden syötettä turhalla spämmäämisellä.
Short:
Blogi.social instanssi on nimensä mukaisesti tarkoitettu blogeille.

Instanssin ajatuksena on tarjota paikka missä blogit voivat linkittää omaan sisältöönsä.

Short: This is a personal instance with a single user

Description:
Privacy

All social media platforms require some data storage, and Mastodon is no exception. However, with more people switching to Mastodon from Twitter, it's important to note some of the privacy concerns. The main concern is that private messages are stored. This is necessary to enable conversations, but it's important to recognize that the operators of the server, as well as any receiving server, may be able to view such messages. Additionally, recipients may screenshot, copy or otherwise share them.

As Mastodon's privacy policy indicates, there are some instances where privacy may be compromised. Some media outlets have used this as an argument against Mastodon, but the level of privacy depends on the instance you use. At billys.mom, we take privacy seriously and only read personal messages if they are reported by a user or if law enforcement issues a reasonable notice.

Can I trust billys.mom?

As with any Mastodon instance, we cannot guarantee 100% privacy. You should always be cautious about what you share on any website. However, we are committed to privacy and will not engage in voluntary surveillance programs. Moreover, governments cannot legally force services to implement blanket spying programs.

If you want to ensure a higher level of privacy, use PGP.

Status

To view the status of billys.mom, please visit status.billys.mom.

Staff

Our moderators and administrators are volunteers who dedicate their spare time to managing the platform and enforcing the rules when necessary. If you would like to support a specific staff member, please reach out to them directly.

Donations

While billys.mom is and will always be free, hosting the platform comes with costs. As such, any donations are greatly appreciated. Even a small amount can make a difference. To donate, please visit me on Liberapay.
Short: Billy's Mom, an privacy-focused instance hosted by Billy (not his mom).

Description:
Guía de uso

En mastodon.help puedes encontrar una guía de uso de mastodon más extensa.

¿Qué es mastodon.lajaqueria.org ?

Es una instancia de mastodon, una red social de código abierto y descentralizada. Esta pensada para albergar a usuarios de Almería, o con alguna vinculación con Almería.

¿ Qué es La Jaquería ?

Es una asociación sin ánimo de lucro cuya finalidad principal es la gestión de un espacio de experimentación tecnológica y creativa en la ciudad de Almería. También damos soporte a algunas de las herramientas on-line de HacklabAlmeria. Un espacio abierto a quien quiera compartir nuestros fines.

Código de conducta

Es recomendable leer (y estar de acuerdo) con los principios descritos en la Netiqueta, es decir cómo comportarse civilizadamente en entornos virtuales.
Short: Servidor de Mastodon que reside físicamente en las instalaciones de La Jaquería, en Almeria. Una puerta local al Fediverso.

Description:
New members

If you want an account at transmom.love I’ll make one for you if:

  1. I (@elilla) know who you are personally, and
  2. You feel like 'trans mom' applies to you in any way (not necessarily as a literal childcarer).

Benefits of using a masto account here:

  • generous limits for toot length/profile fields/etc.
  • will add emojos upon request, just DM me (large blobcat curation already)
  • will block on sight, just DM me (large blocklist already)
  • glitch-soc features (https://glitch-soc.github.io/docs/ )
  • blazing fast thanks to my loving benefactress<3
  • admin is hot
  • Email forwards and Matrix chat @transmom.love available upon request

Drawbacks:

  • mostly empty "Local" timeline
  • limited federation as of now
  • software may be unstable
  • no themes but default ones as of now
  • CW common triggers and uncomfortable subjects, including politics.
  • CW all animal products including nonvegan food, leather, wool, honey etc.
  • CW lewds.
  • CW text posts too, not just images.
  • Caption all images and media, even if with two or three words.
  • No ableism, no body shaming, including insults when punching up. This includes any depreciative terms about a person’s appearance, physical or mental health, and so-called ‘intelligence’, even about bad people.
  • Don’t question the self-reported experiences of marginalised people.

Goes without saying but zero tolerance for: fash, terfism, transmedicalism, white fragility, islamomisia, anti-semitism, swerfism/any kind of sex worker erasure, racism including racist pseudoscience, sexualisation of children, cop apologetics, and centrist/‘free speech’ enabling of any of the former.
Short: Personal server for trans moms <3

Description:
Hier geht's um meer!

Die Meerjungfrauengrotte ist eine queerfreundliche Mastodon-Instanz für alle Meerpersonen und alle Landmenschen, die das Meer lieben.

Wir verwenden die erweiterte Mastodon Glitch Edition. Zeichen je Tröt: 5.000. Tröts können mit HTML oder Markdown formatiert werden.

Safe Space

Die Meerjungfrauengrotte ist ein Safe Space für alle, die von Rassismus und Queerfeindlichkeit betroffen sind.

Wir dulden keine Transfeindlichkeit, kein absichtliches Deadnaming und Misgendering und keine Werbung für Konversionstherapien.

Status

  • Uptime Monitor

Impressum

  • Betreiberin: Michaela Ohlhus-Molthagen
  • Adresse: Michaela Ohlhus-Molthagen, c/o Block Services, Stuttgarter Str. 106, 70736 Fellbach (Bitte keine Pakete oder Päckchen senden – Die Annahme wird verweigert!)
  • Telefon: +49 7156 1658311 (NO SUPPORT! Only for judicial purpose!)
  • Fax: +49 7156 4294999

Nutzungsbedingungen

  1. Die Registrierung eines Nutzerkontos ist ab 16 Jahren zulässig
  2. Personen unter 16, jedoch ab 12 Jahren dürfen ein Nutzerkonto erstellen, wenn die Erziehungsberechtigten zustimmen und alle geteilten Inhalte kontrollieren
  3. Sie sind verantwortlich für Ihre Zugangsdaten zu unseren Nutzerkonten und dürfen diese nicht an andere Personen weitergeben
  4. Sie sind verantwortlich für alle von Ihnen geteilten Inhalte
  5. Sie sichern zu, dass die von Ihnen geteilten Inhalte nicht gegen geltendes Recht verstoßen
  6. Sie sichern zu, die Rechte an allen Inhalten zu besitzen, die Sie teilen
  7. Sie sichern zu, dass die von Ihnen geteilten Inhalte nicht gegen unsere Regeln verstoßen
  8. Wir behalten uns das Recht vor, den Zugang zu unserer Instanz zu moderieren (einschließlich des Rechts, Benutzer oder Instanzen jederzeit zu sperren und Inhalte zu löschen)
  9. Wir behalten uns das Recht vor, unsere Instanz zu jeder beliebigen Zeit einzuschränken oder abzuschalten (wir werden nach Möglichkeit wenigstens drei Monate vor einer Abschaltung darüber informieren)
  10. Wir übernehmen keine Verantwortung für Datenverlust, materielle oder immaterielle Schäden, die durch die Nutzung unserer Dienste entstehen
  11. Wir verpflichten uns, Updates und Bugfixes der verwendeten Software in angemessener Zeit einzuspielen
  12. Wir verpflichten uns, auf schwerwiegende Fehler hinzuweisen
  13. Wir verpflichten uns, Backups zu erstellen, es besteht jedoch kein Anspruch auf Wiederherstellung verlorener Daten oder deren Ersatz
  14. Sogenannte Bots sind zulässig, wenn diese Benutzer*innen dieser oder fremder Instanzen nicht belästigen, nur ungelistet posten, ein #NoBot-Tag in Profilen respektieren und den Betrieb dieses Servers (CPU-Leistung, RAM, Datenübertragung) sowie der Instanz nicht über Gebühr belasten
  15. Werbung von Künstler*innen und eher kleinen Unternehmen ist zulässig, wenn die beworbenen Produkte oder Dienstleistungen einen deutlichen Bezug zum Meer bzw. zum Mermaiding haben und Werbung nicht den einzigen Zweck der betreffenden Accounts darstellt

Spenden

  • PayPal
  • Ko-Fi

Vorschaubild der Instanz

Das Vorschaubild der Instanz "Ocean Sea Mermaid Illustration" wurde von Linnaea Mallette geschaffen (Original-Bild). Lizenz: CC0 Public Domain.

Description:
The premier destination for the most pleasant odors in the federated network.

It is a means of exiting or avoiding the unpleasant odors emanating from the avian source.

I was a somewhat active user of Twitter from December 2008 until January 2023, but ultimately found that I was unable to fully enjoy the experience. Despite this, it is likely that I will continue to have some level of engagement on the platform.

Why this thing?

• Easy URL (and we all toot, amiright?!)
• Federated with other servers who may have their own focus
• Moderation that is controlled by the server operators
• Distributed

It is true that Mastodon can be likened to a modern iteration of IRC (Internet Relay Chat), as it utilizes a distributed network of servers that employ hub-and-spoke architecture to facilitate communication among clients. The ability to implement per-server moderation (such as banning) is a feature inherent in the architecture of IRC, and channel-level moderation can be managed by individual channel owners. In the case of Mastodon, while the platform does not have a specific channel-level moderation configuration, the administrator of a particular instance (referred to as the "site runner") has the capability to delegate moderation responsibilities to trusted users.
Short: Technology, education, social issues, whatever, just don't be a dick about it. Calm, political, discourse is just fine but see previous statement.

Description:
What kvlt.zone is

kvlt.zone is a Mastodon instance inspired by music that falls somewhere in the overlap of metal, gothy shit, noise, dark ambient/dungeon synth, or anything reasonably adjacent to those things. Other things that drive it are horror movies, low budget sci fi/fantasy schlock, weird cinema in general, occult ~ a e s t h e t i c ~ nonsense, satanic #content, vulture culture, leather/kink, and existential bleakness. Despite the instance focus, we don’t take any of it too seriously. This place’s name is a joke and most of the posts are too.

Besides the thematically apt material, the limited user base may also post about goings-on in their lives.

I don’t know what “kvlt” means, is that a meme

kvlt is when you have an album that’s so authentically black metal you recorded it with a piece of barbed wire on a cassette tape that’s already been used twenty times, and you drank blood before every recording session, and your guitar track shreds eardrums and your vocal track sets Norwegian churches on fire.

What’s the kvlt.zone stance on fascists in metal subcultures

kvlt.zone is staunchly antifascist. We do not support unambiguously fascist artists, and our limited user base looks with scrutiny on artists whose content, branding, or press statements seem suspiciously fashy. Although we make every effort to vet our own tastes (which is trve kvlt), if you see something posted that seems to counter this statement, please give a heads up. It’s likely we’re just not aware of the artist(s)’s given issues, and we would rather not dwell in ignorance.

Can I get some other content assurances for federating with you

Our two users will endeavor not to say or do things that are bigoted, oppressive, or otherwise cruel toward anyone on the broader fedi. Bigotry means deliberate or inadvertent exhibitions of gross beliefs that uphold structural violence against systematically marginalized people. We are all taught some flavor of this shit, so mistakes are inevitable, but on kvlt.zone the aim is to NOT double down or give evasive non-apologies if someone points out a mistake.

We will make absolutely NO apologies for cops, bosses, landlords, billionaires, fascist organizations, or state violence.

We are not interested in starting or joining bad faith discussions, using human beings* as discursive punching bags, doxxing other human beings, demanding that everyone shares our stances about whether sexual identity label A is the same as sexual identity label B, etc.

For maximum clarity: cops, bosses, landlords, billionaires, fascists, and state operatives do not count as human beings.

For the most part, do not expect hot takes or public “meta” posts. We will take meaningful private actions wherever applicable, but as an instance of this size, we recognize that very few people could (or should) give a shit about our opinions on interpersonal conflicts we aren’t directly involved in (or that they aren’t). We also keep our heads down usually. So you may find kvlt.zone rarely has an official public “stance” on any given fediverse issue, unless it seems like our specific voices are needed.

kvlt.zone can promise content warnings and/or hidden media for violence (especially gore), references to sexual assault, flashing images, porn or general nudity, kinky shit, and other things that could reasonably trigger PTSD episodes, seizures, etc., or get people in trouble at work. Other CWs are at user discretion.

Can I join

For now, no. That could change but we’d have to know you extremely well, maybe from offline. Both of us can moderate ourselves but that’s where the bandwidth stops, so better to avoid ugly surprises.

Federation practices

As a private instance, defederation is at the discretion of the two admin-users. We will defederate from instances known to be hotbeds for fascists, right-wing or neoliberal dickheads, libertarian “free speech” garbage, child porn, other material that strongly sexualizes minors, other material that’s just categorically vile (zoophilia, necrophilia, etc.), and anything else that falls in this ballpark. We also do not knowingly federate with Threads or any other Meta/Facebook-operated domain. This is not an exhaustive list of reasons we will defederate from an instance, it’s just the shit we find most worthy of defederation. If we haven’t taken action on a particular instance that you know meets the above criteria, it’s likely we just don’t know what’s up. Feel free to send an e-mail or submit a report.

Bear in mind that again, being a private instance we’re not particularly obligated to offer a reason for defederating.

Also bear in mind that an e-mail or report does not guarantee a response if your message appears to be in bad faith. Likewise please consider preemptively silencing kvlt.zone if you’re not interested in what we’re likely to post or if you disagree with the above policies. It’s free and legal to ignore us.
Short: The only fediverse instance for the trve kvlt lifestyle

Description:
Velkommen til Mikrobloggen

Mikrobloggen er en Mastodon-instans i fødiverset og følger Mastodon Server Convenant.

Dette nettstedet eies av Topdogs Sosietetsforening (registrert i Enhetsregisteret) og alle brukere av Mikrobloggen må være betalende medlemmer i foreningen.

Ønsker du å være med på Mikrobloggen?

Du kan nå være en av de aller første. Medlemsskap koster for tiden kroner 200,- per år. Dette er for å dekke driftskostnadene av instansen.

Hvorfor bli medlem?

Ønsker du å være på en norsk instans, tilnærmet fri for regler, hvor du ikke risikerer å bli stengt ute av en vilkårlig moderator og er del av en gjeng som har en felles interesse i å ha en aktiv instans fri for reklame, algoritmer og overvåkning? De som dette høres fristende ut kan være med og dele kostnadene ved å melde seg inn i foreningen.

Du kan lese mer om hvorfor vi startet Mikrobloggen og den over 20 år lange historien til Topdogs Sosietetsforening.

Hvordan bli medlem?

Klikk på "Create Account", fyll ut feltene og skriv i kommentarfeltet at du aksepterer medlemskontigenten og du vil få en epost fra Gaute om hvordan du kan betale. Etter at du har betalt blir kontoen din aktivert.

Eventuelt send en epost til Gaute for andre spørsmål eller mer informasjon.

Discord

Vi har også en Discord server som er åpen og gratis for alle, uansett om du er medlem av foreningen eller ikke.

Driftsråd

Endringer av regler for Mikrobloggen, utnevnelser av roller og eventuelle utestengelser av medlemmer må tas opp i driftsrådet. Driftsrådet kan bestå av følgende roller:

Driftsleder
@gauteweb og @manny er driftsledere. Manny tar seg av teknisk vedlikehold mens Gaute følger opp vaktmestere og holder driftsråd.

Vaktmester
Vaktmesterne er i praksis moderatorer av Mikrobloggen. De skal holde Mikrobloggen ryddig og skikkelig i henhold til reglene som har blitt satt av driftsrådet (se reglene).

Teknisk informasjon

Denne instansen driftes av masto.host, verdens største SaaS leverandør for Mastodon. Dette sikrer best mulig oppetid og sikkerhet. Serverne står fysisk sett i Frankrike.

Følg @manny for driftsmeldinger og annen viktig informasjon til brukere av Mikrobloggen.

Relay tjenester vi bruker

Å bruke en eller flere relay tjenester kan være nyttig for mindre instanser for bedre federering, men vil også kreve mye ressurser og lagringsplass.

  • relay.babb.be
  • relay.mastodon.nu
  • relay.fedi.buzz (utvalgte emneknagger)

Tilpasninger

Mikrobloggen bruker et tilpasset grensesnitt som skiller seg fra standard Mastodon, og vi har implementert en rekke tilpassede emojies som brukerne kan bruke.

  • TangerineUI
  • Emojies fra Flaticons

Oppetidsstatus

Mikrobloggen bruker UptimeRobot til å følge med på oppetiden til selve tjenesten. I tillegg har hosting-leverandøren vår en statusside for infrastrukturen.

  • UptimeRobot
  • Status masto.host

Description:
Tämä on Suomen ev. lut. kirkon Mastodon-palvelin. Palvelimesta vastaa Kirkon viestintä. Palvelin on tarkoitettu kirkon viestinnän käyttöön ja sitä avataan hiljalleen myös kirkon työntekijöille.

Käyttäjätilien myöntämisestä kirkon Mastodon-palvelimelle vastaa Kirkon viestintä. Käyttäjien tulee sitoutua paitsi kirkon oman palvelimen käytössääntöihin, myös noudattamaan Mastodonissa laajemmin noudatettuja periaatteita, joissa kielletään syrjimättömyyttä, rasismia, seksismiä, homofobiaa, transfobiaa, ksenofobiaa tai kastismia edustavat tai sellaiseksi tulkittavissa olevan julkaisut. Kirkon viestintä moderoi kirkon oman palvelimen viestintää, ja sillä on oikeus poistaa käyttäjäoikeudet sellaiselta käyttäjältä, jonka käytös rikkoo näitä sääntöjä, tai jonka laajempi Mastodon-yhteisö tulkitsee toimivan näitä vastaan. Tunnusten aktiivisella moderoinnilla pyritään siihen, että kirkon palvelin jatkossakin pysyy osana Mastodon-verkostoa.

Vaikka kirkon omalle palvelimelle käyttäjätunnuksia toistaiseksi myönnetään vain rajoitetusti, kirkon työntekijöitä kannustetaan liittymään muille avoimille Mastodon-palvelimille. Suomalaisista palvelimista löytyy hyvä lista täältä.

Tältä sivulta taas löytyy joukko suomalaisia Mastodon-käyttäjiä, ja sen kautta on helppo löytää ensimmäiset seurattavansa.
Short: Tämä on Suomen ev. lut. kirkon Mastodon-palvelin. Palvelin on tarkoitettu kirkon viestinnän ja (kohta myös) työntekijöiden käyttöön.

Description: Welcome to IndieGamesDevel Mastodon, your hub for conversations, discussions, and news about the world of indie and AAA video games. This is a gathering place for gamers, developers, and video game critics, where we can share the latest news, reviews, exclusive interviews, and behind-the-scenes of game creation. Our aim is to foster a welcoming and respectful community where passion for video games can be freely expressed and discussed. Join us and become part of our gaming community at indiegamesdevel.com!
Short: Welcome to IndieGamesDevel Mastodon, your hub for conversations, discussions, and news about the world of indie and AAA video games.

Description:
This is a single-user Mastodon instance run by Josh Simmons for Josh Simmons, a community organizer based on Coast Miwok land in Petaluma, California.

As a community organizer, I hold myself to high standards of conduct. Of course, as a single-user instance, it doesn't make sense for me to implement a Code of Conduct, but I have defined some server rules to give you a sense of how I carry myself.

If I let you down, please call me in or call me out. Always striving to do and be better.

Description:
niagara.social is a Mastodon+Hometown instance that hopes to be a social hub for the region of Niagara, Ontario, Canada. The hope is that we will build a safe, inclusive, fun and useful place for those in the region who want to still be social online without being forced to use private software that makes them feel bad.

This instance aims to be an anti-racist, anti-fascist, anti-colonial space and will not tolerate behaviours that are flatly racist, sexist, transphobic, homophobic, ableist, misogynistic, or otherwise bigoted.

Additionally, do not post any illegal content, or talk about illegal acts, or otherwise post anything that could cause legal trouble for the server (where your images and posts live).

niagara.social is always a work-in-progress (but right now it's really a work-in-progress).

Here's where we are: [-] get instance online [ ] consult with organizers and members on rules, a code of conduct, blocklists, new members, etc.. [ ] figure out governance/decision-making [ ] figure out long-term funding (currently paid for by Kostyn, but it's very affordable) [ ] figure out "hit-by-a-bus plan" (get other folks involved in the technical maintance of the site)

Three blocklists have been imported (26/06/2023): 1. Recommended “Bare Minimum” List, 2. Birdsite Live Blocks, 3. Meta Domains Blocklist from https://writer.oliphant.social/oliphant/the-oliphant-social-blocklist

-Kostyn
Short:
niagara.social is a Mastodon+Hometown instance that hopes to be a social hub for the region of Niagara, Ontario, Canada.

Art by @squirrelsnest@niagara.social

Description:
Digital Millennium Copyright Act ("DMCA")

alleysmith.family respects the intellectual property rights of others. Per the DMCA, alleysmith.family will respond expeditiously to claims of copyright infringement on the Site if submitted to alleysmith.family's Copyright Agent as described below. Upon receipt of a notice alleging copyright infringement, alleysmith.family will take whatever action it deems appropriate within its sole discretion, including removal of the allegedly infringing materials and termination of access for repeat infringers of copyright protected content.

If you believe that your intellectual property rights have been violated by alleysmith.family or by a third party who has uploaded materials to our website, please provide the following information to the designated Copyright Agent listed below:

  1. A description of the copyrighted work or other intellectual property that you claim has been infringed;
  2. A description of where the material that you claim is infringing is located on the site;
  3. An address, telephone number, and email address where we can contact you and, if different, an email address where the alleged infringing party, if not alleysmith.family, can contact you;
  4. A statement that you have a good-faith belief that the use is not authorized by the copyright owner or other intellectual property rights owner, by its agent, or by law;
  5. A statement by you under penalty of perjury that the information in your notice is accurate and that you are the copyright or intellectual property owner or are authorized to act on the owner's behalf;
  6. Your electronic or physical signature.

alleysmith.family may request additional information before removing any allegedly infringing material. In the event alleysmith.family removes the allegedly infringing materials, alleysmith.family will immediately notify the person responsible for posting such materials that alleysmith.family removed or disabled access to the materials. alleysmith.family may also provide the responsible person with your email address so that the person may respond to your allegations.

Pursuant to 17 U.S.C. 512(c). alleysmith.family's designated Copyright Agent is:

dan@alleysmith.family

Description:
금지 사항

오픈코스 마스토돈에서는 아래와 같은 행동을 금지합니다.

  • 불법적인 내용을 마치 정당한 요구처럼 작성
  • 지나치게 선정적 미디어나 Toot을 CW와 적절한 경고 없이 로컬 타임라인에 작성
  • 그 외 다른 사용자들이 불쾌감을 느낄 수 있는 정치 또는 과격한 내용을 작성
  • 다른 사용자를 모욕, 괴롭힘, 사칭, 명예훼손등의 목적으로 계정을 만들거나 Toot을 작성

이러한 사항들을 위반한다면 여러분의 계정이 정지될 수 있습니다.
Short: 홈랩과 콘솔,휴대기기에 관심이 많은 사용자들을 위한 오픈코스(OpenCousrse) 마스토돈입니다.

Description:
ガイドライン

違反者には、アカウントの停止等の措置を取らせていただく場合がございます。
措置に不服がある場合には、管理者までお問い合わせください。

  1. 法律は守ってください
  2. CWやNSFWはちゃんと使ってください
  3. 他人に迷惑をかけたり、不快にするような行為は禁止です
  4. 本インスタンスは外部に公開されています
  5. ローカルタイムラインで発言するときもなるべくメンションで
  6. みんな仲良く

1. 法律は守ってください

犯罪に加担していそうだったり、日本法に抵触するようなトゥートは禁止です。最悪警察や裁判所の要請に応じてログを開示することになります。

2. CWやNSFWはちゃんと使ってください

誰かが不快になりそうだと思った文章を投稿したい時にはContent Warning(CW)を、画像にはNot Safe For Work(NSFW)タグを付けてください。たとえ付けていても日本法に抵触するような画像を投稿する行為は禁止です。
とはいえ、正直なところ1人でも傷つく可能性がある投稿には全てCWを付けろと言ってもキリが無くなってしまいます。特にローカルTLや連合TLはたくさんの人の発言がほぼフィルタリングされずに流れてくるタイムラインです。それらのタイムラインを覗くときには不愉快な投稿が目に見えてしまう可能性があると言うことをある程度割り切ってください。

3. 他人に迷惑をかけたり、不快にするような行為は禁止です

4. 本インスタンスは外部に公開されています

本インスタンスはローカルタイムラインや鍵がついていないアカウントのトゥートについては外部に公開されています。機密情報などの取り扱いについては個人の管理の元、各個人で注意し発言していただき、必要に応じてこのインスタンスではなくSlackやメールなどを使用して外部に公開されていない場所でやり取りしていただくようお願いします。

5. ローカルタイムラインで発言するときもなるべくメンションで

Mastodonはローカルタイムラインを使ってまるでインスタンス全員参加のチャットのように話ができますが、常に全員がログイン状態でない以上割込みや予期しないトゥートなどで会話がとぎれることも多いです。ローカルタイムラインで発言するときも、なるべくTwitterのようにメンションを基準にして話をすることをお勧めします。

6. みんな仲良く

ブロックとかミュートとかあるからね、絶対に仲良くできなさそうな人がいたら突っかかる前に距離を取ろうね。ブロックしました報告とかもトラブルの元になるだけだからやめようね。
人に自分ルールを押し付けて不快にさせる行為も禁止です。あなたのルールはここのルールではありません。ネタだとしても不快にさせる時点でよくありません。

host元

本インスタンスは Masto.host によってホスティングされています。登録していただいたメールアドレスや過去ログの保存については同サービスの規約に準じるものとします。

お問い合わせ先

お問い合わせは, 管理者 までご連絡ください。

上記を、本インスタンスの利用ガイドラインと定めます。
ガイドラインの参考にした元は mstdn.jp のルールです。
Short: gametech.masto.host
Official Mastodon of Rencher Industries

Description:
Code of Conduct The following guidelines are not a legal document, and final interpretation is up to the administration of masto.evelynyap.com; they are here to provide you with an insight into our content moderation policies:

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline: 1. Advertising 2. Uncurated news bots posting from third-party news sources 3. Nudity, pornography and sexually explicit content, including artistic depictions 4. Gore and extremely graphic violence, including artistic depictions

The following types of content will be removed from the public timeline, and may result in account suspension and revocation of access to the service: 1. Racism or advocation of racism 2. Sexism or advocation of sexism 3. Casteism or advocation of casteism 4. Discrimination against gender and sexual minorities, or advocation thereof Xenophobic and/or violent nationalism 5. Spreading disinformation or conspiracy theories that undermine public health

The following types of content are explicitly disallowed and will result in revocation of access to the service: 1. Sexual depictions of children 2. Content illegal in Germany and/or France, such as holocaust denial or Nazi symbolism 3. Conduct promoting the ideology of National Socialism 4. Any conduct intended to stalk or harass other users, or to impede other users from utilizing the service, or to degrade the performance of the service, or to harass other users, or to incite other users to perform any of the aforementioned actions, is also disallowed, and subject to punishment up to and including revocation of access to the service. This includes, but is not limited to, the following behaviors: 5. Continuing to engage in conversation with a user that has specifically has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist may be considered harassment, regardless of platform-specific privacy tools employed. 6. Aggregating, posting, and/or disseminating a person's demographic, personal, or private data without express permission (informally called doxing or dropping dox) may be considered harassment. 7. Inciting users to engage another user in continued interaction or discussion after a user has requested for said engagement with that user to cease and desist (informally called brigading or dogpiling) may be considered harassment. 8. These provisions notwithstanding, the administration of the service reserves the right to revoke any user's access permissions, at any time, for any reason, except as limited by law.

Cross-posting

"Cross-posting" is the automatic copying of posts from one platform to another.

That definition does not include the simultaneous posting to multiple platforms from the same app.

Cross-posting from Mastodon to other platforms is permitted. Cross-posting into Mastodon from another platform is permitted under the following terms:

  1. The account is regularly monitored by the author, so that interactions from Mastodon users are not ignored.
  2. The account being cross-posted is owned by the same person. Third-party copying of content is not permitted.
  3. The account also posts non cross-posts.

Description:
Wikimedia España es el capítulo reconocido por la Fundación Wikimedia en España: una asociación sin ánimo de lucro que promueve el conocimiento libre y los proyectos Wikimedia, siendo Wikipedia el más conocido. Nos constituimos en 2011 y llevamos todos estos años trabajando para mejorar la accesibilidad, el uso y la participación en la enciclopedia libre y sus proyectos hermanos, tanto a nivel social como institucional.

La fotografía de la parte superior está tomada por Péricles Dias de Oliveira durante las Jornadas #WMES2022, y disponible bajo licencia Creative Commons Atribución 2.0.

Description:
What is this server for?

  • The warmth of sharing poetry. Feeling seen, and seeing others.
  • Public posts should be poems you wrote that are over one week old and the inspirations behind them.
  • Except for Community Saturdays when it's open to anything related to poetry: questions, polls, event announcements etc.

Why am I building it?

  • I've experienced the joy of sharing poems in a small group, as opposed to sharing on general social media. The vibe is just different in poetry only spaces.

Why should you trust me?

  • I've been writing and performing poetry for as long as I can remember. I understand the whole range of emotions that come about from sharing bits of your spirit in a performance or post.
  • I've helped build IRL safe spaces for writing communities
  • I started Giant Heart Poetry Co. to do larger poetry projects in a sustainable way. This Mastodon is one of them. We're independent and will grow slowly to help ensure that the community remains kind.

How does it work?

  1. Apply through this form
  2. You will be emailed an invite link to sign up
  3. Share your poems and memories
  4. Favourite and Reply to other posts
  5. Follow other poets
Short: A safe space to share your poems and the stories behind them.

Description:
Non Sequiturs is a community focused on tech, pedantry, and humor.

Most of the discussions here revolve around technology, hobbies, and silliness. Some of the later may include U.S. political satire. There is also a focus on science and reason, including atheism. Generally speaking, the community promotes civil rights and equality for all regardless of gender identity, sexual preference, political party, etc. But we also believe in frank discussions so leave your offense at the door. If we don't have tough conversations we can't truly understand and appreciate each other.

The community is managed by Michael Argentini, a software developer and Managing Partner for Fynydd and Blue Sequoyah Technologies, the project lead for Coursabi, and Āthepedia founder. He also has several nerdy open source projects on Github.
Short: Non Sequiturs is the personal Mastodon instance of Michael Argentini.
